data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Design patterns are easiest understood when looking at concrete examples. For ____ the ____ ten ____ may ____. However, you ____ make ____ a ____ to ____ about ____ of ____ other ____ mentioned ____. The more patterns you know, the better.
data.partBlankContent: Design patterns are easiest understood when looking at concrete examples. For begi_____ the foll_____ ten patt____ may suf____. However, you sho___ make i_ a ha___ to le___ about so__ of t__ other patt____ mentioned be___. The more patterns you know, the better.
data.answer: 当看到具体的例子时，设计模式是最容易理解的。对于初学者，以下十种模式就足够了。但是，您应该养成学习下面提到的其他一些模式的习惯。你知道的图案越多越好。
